Reviews.Title: Christmas present for daughter
Reviews.Author: Nathailia
Reviews.Content: Shee loves it simply put; easy to setup and shows a really clear pictures. The basketball feels like the real thing!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the Basketball Fan!
Reviews.Author: Teara
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as a Christmas gift for my 16 year old son; his favorite sport is basketball! He loves it! It is a nice size for his room. It looks and feels like a real basketball! The sound is great, it has a good picture and the price was right. It can be placed on a table top or mounted on the wall! I would recommend this for any basketball fan. We have only had it for a couple of weeks so I do not know how it will rate long term, but I am very pleased with it initially!

Reviews.Title: Awesome looking
Reviews.Author: BUGMAN
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Put it in our locker room and it really makes it look great. Nice picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: hannspree tv
Reviews.Author: judy exner
Reviews.Content: the instructions were easy to follow; the picture is great!if everything continues to work properly, it will be super.

Reviews.Title: Used but good
Reviews.Author: Kim Smith
Reviews.Content: Kids love it it really shaped and feels like a basketball. Bigger than I thought it would be .like it

Reviews.Title: Product was manufactured over 2 years ago !!!
Reviews.Author: JAMES LLOYD
Reviews.Content: Grandson loves it. Seems to be just fine for now. No one around us have one. My major complaint is the set I got was Manufactured in "JANUARY 2011". I contacted support and said they would send me another set that was "newer". The second one arrived and it also was manufactured in :JANUARY 2011". Sent the second set back as the first one was already in place.If support team new this ahead of time it could have saved me much time and hassle waiting for and returning the second set, as well as saving AMAZON the expense of shipping twice. AMAZON should state that these are older production run items in the discription so everyone will know beforehand exactly what they are purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: Initially my son loved this tv as it looks and feels like a real basketball. After less than three months of use however, the television completely stopped working! No picture. Nothing. We called to find out what our recourse would be and were told that we need to not only wait for emails, print copies of the emails and fill out the forms, but then we need to find a box large enough and pack the tv using specific instructions given by the seller. We have not found a box to fit and needless to say the television still sits,  unusable . The forms we printed are now expired so we need to go through the whioe phone call, waiting for email process again once we find a box! So,not worth it!  Don't waste your money on this television,

Reviews.Title: Excellent condition
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Hayden
Reviews.Content: What more could a dad want on Father's Day?  My kids are happy; Hubby's happy.  Now, where to put it?!

Reviews.Title: Cool TV
Reviews.Author: Cei
Reviews.Content: My son made the honor roll and this was his gift.  Its a great conversational piece and he's a true basketball fan, so this was perfect

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!!!
Reviews.Author: EveSlim
Reviews.Content: Looks fabulous in my little boys room along with his basketball toy box. He loves it!!! I would recommend to any little boy who loves sports and especially basketball.

Reviews.Title: Cool!
Reviews.Author: T.B-R.
Reviews.Content: I ordered on a Monday & received it on Friday, which was sooner than initially estimated. I purchased "used, like new". It appears 2 b just like new! I have not actually put it 2 use bcuz it's for my son's bdrm when we move in June. However, it's very cute & ideal size 4 a bedrm & will be a great asset 4 his sports theme room.

Reviews.Title: Basketball Televisions
Reviews.Author: Cynthia W Timmons
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these basketball televisions for my two grandsons. They are a big hit when everyone sees them. My one year old grandson walked up to the television and was feeling the basketball as though sizing it up. He loves lying in his bed and gazing at the tv. It was a spur of the moment decision to get them for them for Christmas. My oldest grandson loves looking at DVDs and he now has a television of his own in his room and doesn't have to share.

Reviews.Title: So cool!
Reviews.Author: Jeanniemcb
Reviews.Content: I bought this television for my 8 year old son who is absolutely mad about basketball. He wants to be in the NBA someday. We redid his room in a basketball theme and this tv worked out perfectly! It is the perfect size for his room. We mounted it to the wall so it's part if the decor. It looks great and sounds great! We are 100% satisfied!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Bob W
Reviews.Content: First one had dead pixels but the second one has been working very well well six more words for review sucks

Reviews.Title: Amazon took good care of me
Reviews.Author: Natalie Maggiore "Natalie"
Reviews.Content: First tv. Signed for it, took it out the box, Plugged it , turned it on , and it  didn't work, smoke came out the back . I sent it back for free,Amazon sent another tv and this one is fine. I won't lie I was scared when I plugged it in . But it's fine. My sons love their new tv. I use the sleep feature so i don't have to get up n turn it off

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Trinity
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boys and they absolutely love it.. the rubber smell goes away after the first 2 days but very easy to set up and all around great tv

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Jesse C.
Reviews.Content: Great Picture for Price!, Perfect for my son's room and seems like a well built product. Arrived as expected and I would recommend this TV without a problem. Good Buy!! Adults and kids love it who see it hanging in my sons room.

Reviews.Title: got it for my son
Reviews.Author: joann r
Reviews.Content: So far have not had any issue. Got as a gift for my son. We were able to hook it up to his xbox without any problems and he loves it due to the fact that he loves basketball. It feels and looks like a real basketball. Especially nice if the room has a basketball theme. I and especially my son are very happy with it. Very well priced as well =)
